author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.11.0 to 0.12.0.
Commits - [`0452387`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/045238740f559d99a52acd1c0b0d7936d55da2c6) Update to version 0.12.0. - [`1ada55f`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/1ada55fd60a76ce30ce9674fc581d42cec355ed5) Modify build-demo to work with updated dependencies and recent changes. - [`550ef6a`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/550ef6a53ddcd678383f3fc04ffd7031a852374e) Update dependencies: @types/node to 10.12.21, browserify to 16.2.3, eslint to... - [`ff50da3`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/ff50da3b429661ef830c9dd5906a374b99da5a27) Re-implement MD038 to handle multi-line spans better and rely less on RegExp. - [`3b49414`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/3b4941418365f3a038814ce3569d1516d0e0cc4b) Re-implement MD032 to detect missed scenarios and simplify. - [`8a17595`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/8a175955d71acdae1a4f593469b975ba6813df63) Add options.markdownItPlugins to support using markdown-it plugins when parsing. - [`ff86e1d`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/ff86e1d7f1c690f4dfd6438c61f6b8b87bbe0ea3) Add optional "information" property to custom rules to provide a link to more... - [`b77dd5c`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/b77dd5ccd317d6d134fbd2067f8aad6a29c89362) Simplify handling of internal lineMetadata array (slightly faster now). - [`51a57a0`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/51a57a07c86550ecc0f5e4783c1ca3d146c8d02b) Update test file with new cases from Ruby implementation. - [`6c57203`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/6c57203ae5c7d85715e5c8a4e9055406f2822a6e) Use tokens (vs. RegExp) for identifying fenced code blocks (fixes [#151](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/issues/151), fixes... - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/compare/v0.11.0...v0.12.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.11.0&new-version=0.12.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.11.0&new-version=0.12.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) --- **Note:** This repo was added to Dependabot recently, so you'll receive a maximum of 5 PRs for your first few update runs. Once an update run creates fewer than 5 PRs we'll remove that limit. You can always request more updates by clicking `Bump now` in your [Dependabot dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com).
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in your Dependabot [dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com): - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.body: Looks like markdownlint is up-to-date now, so this is no longer needed.

title: WIP Build(deps): Bump markdownlint from 0.11.0 to 0.12.0 in /test/common/markdown
